tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I recently needed to get some dental work done and I had an excellent experience with Dr.Sejal Jain at Smiles And More Dental Care Center For those with a short attention span, here's my review: Dr.Sejal is a great communicator, has an excellent and calming bedside manner, and as a nervous patient she gave me an excellent, pain-free experience! HIGHLY recommended. For people who have had some bad/painful past experiences with dentists. Unfortunately, I waited almost a months to go to the dentist because I was afraid. So Finally I decided to go in for a visit. When I came in to the clinic Dr.Sejal greeted me with a friendly smile and a warm handshake and I immediately felt more at ease. She took a look at my problem tooth as well as a check of all my other teeth and talked me through the procedure we needed to take on. My hands were immediately sweating and my heart was racing at the thought of the procedure that was about to happen. She gave me some options for anesthesia and I told her of some of my last experiences and my fear, so we made a choice for the best option for me. She put me at ease through the whole numbing process and I knew I was going to be fine. She kindly and patiently talked me through out every step and within minutes of beginning till the end of procedure I was completely relaxed WHICH WAS A MIRACLE! By the time we finished I Just Thanked Her For My RCT(Root Canal Treatment) Done So Smoothly. That night when I lay in bed I had the biggest relief knowing I didn't have to dread making that appointment and was to thankful that it all went so unbelievably well. Thanks to Dr.Sejal and Her Awesome Assistant for such a great experience! I haven't been this happy leaving the dental Clinic in a very long time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I work in an entertainment industry and my smile has value. I had done some amateur adjustments more then a decade ago in a small town, to my frontal teeth n now was the time to repair for good. I Thank Dr. Sejal from bottom of my heart for completing my childhood dream of a lovely, Symmetrical smile Today. " I can't stop Smiling now".
She was the only one, who could understand what I ment when I wanted to do this procedure and how I wanted it to look like ( Compare to 4 other experts I consulted before her) Value for the Money and My time. Thanks a ton üôèüèΩ God Bless

tags: None
review:
Dr Jain is very professional.She is  thorough with diagnosis and check up. I went for tooth cleanup which was done with great detail, additionally she did a detailed diagnosis and recommended necessary treatment and effects etc.
I could see visuals of my teeth ( with a small camera in my mouth)and could see what was wrong with them, this was very helpful. This helped examine things in details and which I could see as well.
Dr Jain is very punctual as I hardly had to wait for my appointment. I was comfortable throughout the cleaning procedure.

tags: None
review: I visited Dr Sejal Jain with severe toothache. She quickly examined and gave a prompt analysis of cause and effect. Within 30 minutes first phase of treatment was completed and I felt great relief. Further actions were also completed within the timelines. I find Dr. Jain extremely professional and caring.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Doctor is punctual, friendly and equiped with all the latest equipments. All the appointments took place without any delay. All problems were explained in detailed and then provided necessary and correct treatment. There was immediate relief from toothache and in case RCT- it was painless. Highly recommended for All dental issues. I would surely visit regularly for follow ups.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

Dr. Sejal Jain is very professional, she takes the time to explain what needs to be done and provides valuable advice , It's not easy to find a good dentist   I highly recommend Dr. Sejal Jain for kids and adults.
